snippet: “Playwright: From Page to Stage,” on the PBS series “Independent Lens,” follows two playwrights, Rajiv Joseph and Tarell Alvin McCraney, as they have new works produced.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews television documentary Playwright: From Page to Stage, part of PBS series Independent Lens.
lead_paragraph: “Playwright: From Page to Stage,” on the PBS series “Independent Lens,” follows two playwrights, Rajiv Joseph and Tarell Alvin McCraney, as they have new works produced.

headline.seo: ‘Playwrights,’ With Rajiv Joseph and Tarell Alvin McCraney, on PBS
headline.main: Ambitions That Rise Long Before Curtains Do
headline.print_headline: Ambitions That Rise Long Before Curtains Do
